<p class="card-text">
**{{< fa pen-fancy >}} LaTeX**

If you are planning on pursuing any STEM-related field, I highly recommend that you learn **LaTeX**. LaTeX is a markup language used primarily to generate mathematical documents, and includes extensive support for typesetting equations. **Overleaf** (which, fun fact, was called "ShareLaTeX" back when I started using it) is an online interface which can be used to generate LaTeX documents without having to download any software on your computer, and also provides a very useful "Learn LaTeX in 30 minutes" guide. <br />
